title: Why does every support main not understand the value of cs?
body: Maybe it is because they always play a role that doesn't cs so they don't know how to cs. Had a {{champion:25}} support last game who kept chasing kills and expecting her team to follow despite we being behind. Then she had the audacity to call us out for not following. May I remind all of you that 1 kill = 15 cs. If a wave is crashed under my tower don't expect me to assist you on your roam. If we have a teammate dead don't expect me to participate in losing teamfights. I think support mains do this so they can brag about how many assists they have in a game.
